cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 15th Nov 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 15th Nov 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 10 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
10 Bed Dorm with ensuite bathroom. Fully Air-Conditioned.  
Rate includes WiFi, complimentary daily Yoga classes, surfboard hire & affordable bike hire

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Double Room with share facilities, air-conditioning, in addition to a vanity sink & mirror. 
Rate includes Towel & Toiletries.
Rate includes WiFi, complimentary daily Yoga classes, surfboard hire & affordable bike hire.
